result.execSummary:
The defendant Andre P Brown was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manufacture/Deliver Cocaine (>1-5g), a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(cm)1r.
  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).
  • Possess w/Intent-Cocaine (>5-15g), a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(cm)2.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
During period of prison incarceration, defendant's Prison Inmate funds are to be applied to restitution owed, per prison policy
.
Consecutive to: Consecutive to the sentence in La Crosse Co case 14CF286
.
.

superMiscConds.notes:
Pay restitution of $400 for 'Buy Money'

During period of Extended Supervision, restitution will be paid under the terms of a payment plan to be established with the PO but calling for no less than 2.5% of gross wages to be paid toward restitution and to be enforced through a wage assignment
.

Def to undergo Alcohol and Drug Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommendations.
.

Def is not to consume or possess any alcohol, drugs or controlled substances without a prescription from licensed physician, with random testing
.

Complete a Domestic Abuse assessment and follow-through with any treatment recommended

Complete any other treatment deemed necessary by the PO

Pay Crime Lab and Drug Assessment fee (see 'other' above for amount)

Pay DOC Supervision fees

If extended supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of resititution victims and/or govermental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt

supervisions.notes:
Consecutive to: Consecutive to Ct 1 of this case
.

Conditions of Extended Supervision are the same as Ct 1
.

Consecutive to: Consecutive to Ct 2 of this case
.
.

Conditions of Extended Supervision are the same as Cts 1 & 2
.
